summary: Build an app for a coaching institute named "Shikshy mantra" with an admin panel and a student signup panel.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal modern wordmark logo reading “Shikshy mantra” (shikshy-mantra-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Warm, education-themed hero illustration with books/stationery and abstract shapes (shikshy-mantra-hero.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create a public landing page for the coaching institute named "Shikshy mantra" with clear navigation to Student Signup and Admin Panel.
Implement a Student Signup panel that lets a user register a student profile (at minimum: full name, phone number, email, course of interest) and then view their submitted profile.
Implement an Admin Panel that is protected so only designated admin principals can access it, and that allows admins to view the list of student signups and open a detail view for each signup.
Add Internet Identity based authentication UI for the app, including sign-in/sign-out controls and showing the current signed-in principal (or a friendly logged-out state).
Apply a coherent visual theme across the app (layout, typography, spacing, color palette) suitable for an education/coaching institute brand; avoid blue/purple as the primary palette.
Generate and include static brand images for "Shikshy mantra" and render them in the UI from frontend/public/assets/generated (not via backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create admin panel for Shikshy mantra coaching institute app
Create student signup panel for Shikshy mantra coaching institute app
Add backend data models and APIs to store and retrieve student signups, including: create signup, list signups (admin-only), and get signup by id (admin-only).
